content:
I think the themes of grief and loss were handled really well in the movie, especially in the scenes between Tom Holland's Spider-Man and the other Spider-Men. It was emotional to see them come to terms with their responsibilities and the consequences of their actions. However, I did feel like some of the supporting characters, like MJ and Ned, could have had more development in terms of their emotional arcs. They were kind of pushed to the side as the multiverse plot took center stage.

By the way, speaking of social media, I've been trying to engage more with others on different platforms. I recently commented on a friend's Facebook post about her new puppy, and we ended up having a long conversation about dog breeds in the comments section. I also shared a funny meme about puppies on that post, which got 5 likes. On Instagram, I commented on a post by my favorite fitness influencer, congratulating her on reaching 1 million followers. She liked my comment and even sent me
